add_wallet_tip: Add a wallet to hubii core by clicking '+ Add a wallet' in the top right corner
fetch_transactions_error: There was an problem fetching this wallet's transaction history. Please try again later.
no_transaction_history: There is no transaction history for this wallet
my_transaction_notes_1: In this alpha build of hubii core, only confirmed transactions are displayed. This means recently sent transactions may take some time to appear, while they are pending.
my_transaction_notes_2: Until support for pending transactions is added into hubii core, you can
add_address_contacts_book: Add address to your contacts book
enter_valid_address_contact: Please enter a valid address or contact name
welcome_testnet: Hi, thanks for trying this alpha build of hubii core. In this build, you can interact with the Ethereum testnet Ropsten. Stay tuned for mainnet support, which will be enabled very soon
import_wallet_question: Would you like to import an existing wallet or create a new one?
enter_wallet_name: Enter a name for your wallet
please_enter_wallet_name: Please enter a name for your wallet
enter_wallet_password: Enter a password to secure your wallet
please_enter_wallet_password: Please enter a password for your wallet
password_8chart_min: Password must be at least 8 characters
wallet_mnemonic_phrase_warning_1: Write down the mnemonic phrase below and store it somewhere safe, it is the key to your wallet. If you lose the phrase any funds in your wallet will be lost forever!
wallet_mnemonic_phrase_warning_2: Never share the phrase with anybody. Possession of this phrase means possession of all of your funds.
wallet_mnemonic_phrase_warning_3: If you wish to store any significant amount of funds, it is strongly recommended to use a hardware wallet. Hardware wallets are a much safer alternative to software wallets.
wallet_mnemonic_phrase_warning_4: Confused? Google search 'Ethereum wallet security' and do some research. Only you are responsible for your funds.
invalid_private_key: Sorry, that private key doesn't seem to be valid
please_enter_private_key: Please enter your wallet's private key
verify_device_details: Verify the details shown on your device
hw_unknown_error: Something went wrong, please reconnect your device and try again
ledger_set_browser_support_no: Please set 'Browser support' to 'No' in your device settings to continue
ledger_connected_not_browser_support_err: Ledger connected but does not appear to have 'Browser support', please diable browser support in the Ethereum app settings.
ledger_connected_not_eth_open_error: Ledger connected but does not appear to have the Ethereum app open. Please download the Ethereum app from the Ledger Manager and open it on your device.
ledger_connect_unlock: Connect and unlock your Ledger Device
ledger_open_eth_app: Open the Ethereum app on your device
ledger_contract_transaction_data_error: Failed to transfer token. Please make sure 'Contract data' is set to yes on your Ledger device.
trezor_invalid_passphrase_error: Please reconnect your Trezor device, and make sure you provided the correct passphrase for this wallet.
trezor_connect_unlock: Please connect and unlock your Trezor device to continue
select_import_address: Select the address you would like to import
derivation_title_1: hubii core software wallet, Jaxx, Metamask, Exodus, TREZOR (ETH), Digital Bitbox
wallet_private_key_warning: Wallets imported by private key are difficult to backup. It is recommended to sweep your funds into a mnemonic based wallet, which allows backup by a word phrase rather than a long hex string
import_keystore_failed_error: Failed to import wallet: Please make sure the keystore file is valid.
